claim: 42 (film) was filmed in front of a live audience.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Audience questions for the Burt Reynolds Q&A session were scripted , with members of the audience given line readings - this was necessary , as unlike normal talk shows filmed with a multiple-camera setup , the low-budget show was filmed with only one camera , and so it was necessary to do multiple retakes to get multiple camera angles .

claim: 42 (film) was filmed in front of a live audience.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Throughout the show , contestants must perform in front of the judges , and each year initial auditions have been held in front of a live audience .

claim: 42 (film) was filmed in front of a live audience.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The successful auditionees chosen by the producers were then invited back to the last set of auditions that took place in front of the judges and a live audience in June 2015 .

premise_source_doc_sentence: This show was recorded in front of a live audience at the Yerba Buena Center for the Arts in San Francisco , with help from KQED-FM , during the '98 Public Radio Conference in San Francisco .

claim: 42 (film) was filmed in front of a live audience.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The next round was bootcamp , which for the first time on The X Factor Australia incorporated the five seat challenge , where each act performed in front of the judges and a live audience to earn a place on one of the five seats in their category .
